## Ingredients

1/2 to 3/4 cup cream
4 tablespoons sugar
1 teaspoon vanilla
1 egg (optional)
1 bowl of light, clean snow (6-8 cups)

## Instructions

"Stir until it's soft," Chloe Tuttle says.
